Detailed Description

Provides polygon functions, such as intersection, difference, and union.

std::vector< Coord > RmPolygon::fill (   )  const
 

Returns a vector with the coordinates that compose the interior fill of all non-hole contours within this RmPolygon.

Those cells on the northern and eastern borders of a polygon are excluded in order to allow for those cases when polygons share borders.

Definition at line 193 of file RmPolygon.cpp.
